dp.title: Building an interactive WebGL experience in Next.js
dp.subtitle: More interactivity with the web 3D graphic rendering API.
dp.postContent1: WebGL is a JavaScript API for rendering 3D graphics within a web browser, giving developers the ability to create unique, delightful graphics, unlike anything a static image is capable of. By leveraging WebGL, we were able to take what would have been a static conference signup and turned it into
